overview: Be in the audience for a peep-show rehearsal. Nine guys of twenty years old, selected for their beauty and youthfulness, audition in front of a choreographer sensitive to their provocative attitudes. The curves of their bodies, the camber and smoothness of their buttocks warm up the seating area, audience and control room. An enormous erotic cavalcade finishes the feverish rehearsal.
tagline: 10 men who stop at nothing for the final undress rehearsal
title: Coming Soon
